content: आदत्त, आत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [आ-दा-क्त] {@--1@} Taken, received, assumed, accepted; आत्तसारश्चक्षुषा स्वविषयः <ls>M. 2</ls>; एवमात्तरतिः <ls>R. 11. 57</ls>; <ls>M. 5. 1</ls>; °हासः <ls>Ratn. 1</ls> smiling; <ls>Ratn. 1. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Agreed to, undertaken, begun. {@--3@} Attracted. {@--4@} Drawn out, extracted; गामात्तसारां रघुरप्यवेक्ष्य <ls>R. 5. 26</ls>; °बलं <ls n="R.">11. 76</ls> taken away.
